resources.string: To use this feature, please allow the microphone!
Allow the following requests to use all the functions of the program

We use a microphone to record sound and play it back when the time comes back. We assure you that we will not use the microphone for evil purposes. Some functions in the program may not work if you do not allow the microphone.

Allow this request so that the program wakes up and warns you when the time is right, even when you are working. If you do not allow it, the program will not work normally. Click the button below to allow. And find the "Reminder" app in the settings section and enable it.
For owners of Mi brand phones (Xiaomi)
If you have a Mi brand phone (Xiaomi). Go to app settings using the button below to allow the following:
If you do not allow this, the program will not work normally.
A reminder at this time is on the list!
